sentences.sContent: In 1904 Johannes Schmidt, a young Danish oceanographer and biologist, got a job aboard the Thor, a Danish research vessel, studying the breeding habits of food fishes such as cod and herring.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1904 Johannes Schmidt, a young Danish oceanographer and biologist, got a job aboard the Thor, a Danish research vessel, studying the breeding habits of food fishes such as cod and herring.
sentences.sCn: 年轻的丹麦海洋学家兼生物学家乔纳斯·施密特在丹麦研究船“托尔”号上找到一份工作，研究食用鱼（如鳕鱼和鲱鱼）的繁殖习性。

remMethod.val: ocean(海洋) + o + graph(用图表示) + er(表人， 名词后缀) → 通过图表示海洋情况的人 → 海洋学者

words.tran: 海洋的；海洋产出的；在海洋中生活的；广阔无垠的
